channel.title: Space mission of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the space mission of the day.

item.title: Timeline of Mars Science Laboratory
item.description: The Mars Science Laboratory and its rover, Curiosity, were launched from Earth on 26 November 2011. As of August 20, 2025, Curiosity has been in Gale Crater on the planet Mars for 4635 sols (4762 total days; 13 years, 14 days) since landing on 6 August 2012. (See Current status.)
